TITLE: Volumio smart power settings
SUBTITLE: Setup your GPIO button actions
SUBTITLEWARN: WARNING !!! Setting a wrong GPIO pin may damage your device ! Set carefully ! We disclaim any responsabilities in case of problem
DESCENABLESHUTDOWN: Shutdown the device when this GPIO pin is activated
DESCENABLEBOOTOK: Output this pin when device is ready
DESCENABLEDSOFTSD: Reboot the device when this GPIO pin is activated
